ygData.subject: RE: RE: Missing bard songs (was Updated Song Analysis 2 1+)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Missing 3-4 spells out of 200 is hardly equivalent to missing 3-4 out of 50. Also pure casters have nearly every advantage as it is in this game. ... Bind
ygData.messageBody:
>You'd be bitter playing just about any class then. Almost every class is
>"unfinished". There are many spells and skills that were never implemented
>or useless. For example many classes have the Sense Magic spell, which has
>no use at all. And what about the poor Rogues? They are much worse off
>than Bards.

Missing 3-4 spells out of 200 is hardly equivalent to missing 3-4 out of 50.
Also pure casters have nearly every advantage as it is in this game.

>Haha. Kitasi, I thought you said the ability to bind was one of the most
>important abilities in the game. How could giving Bind to Bards not be
>unbalancing?

Bind is the most important ability in the game to HAVING FUN, not to beating
MOB's. Since Making the game more fun is in no way unbalancing and bind
won't increase a bard's ability to beat anything, especially at a high
level, it isn't even remotely unbalancing.

I may be somewhat bitter that bards are treated as an afterthought in many
ways by Verant, but at least I'm not bitter towards anyone personally.

Kitasi
